frontmatter.titlepage:
Jack Welford Moss Papers, 1925-1968
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms1991-055
Special Collections, Virginia Tech 2013 &contact;
Processed by: Betsy Reed, Graduate Assistant, and Kira A. Dietz, Archivist,
Special Collections

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: This collection contains materials related to and collected by Jack Welford Moss, a Virginia Polytechnic Institute alum.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Jack Welford Moss Papers must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Jack Welford Moss Papers, Ms1991-055, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was acquired by Special Collections in 1991.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Jack Welford Moss Papers was completed in November 2013.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Jack Welford Moss was a student at Virginia Polytechnic Institute in the mid to late 1920s. He was a civil engineering major and by his senior year was a Captain in Company A. He also played varsity football and was an active member in the Virginia Tech Minstrels club.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collections contains materials connected to Jack Welford Moss. The collection consists of photographs (some of which are identified), graduation programs, a Varsity Football certificate, copies of the V.P.I Skipper, editions of The Bugle, and textbooks from the civil engineering program. Materials date from 1925 to 1968, covering both his time as a student and an alum.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection remains in its original order, apart from materials removed for cataloging (see Separated Materials note).

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Materials
separatedmaterial.p: The following publications were removed from the collection and cataloged for the Rare Book Collection:

item.emph: Coal Miners' Pocketbook: Principles, Rules, Formulas, and Tables

list.item: National Electrical Code Handbook by Arthur L. Abbott
A Future System of Airports For New Jersey: Phase B Report Vo. 1 by Albert E. Blomquist and Associates
A Future System of Airports For New Jersey: Phase B Report Vo. 2 by Albert E. Blomquist and Associates
Strength of Materials by James E. Boyd
Standard Handbook for Electrical Engineers by Frank F. Fowle
Handbook for Highway Engineers by Wilson G. Harger, C.E. and Edmund A. Bonney
Laboratory Manual Arranged to Accompany "A Course in General Chemistry" by William McPherson and William Edwards Henderson
A Text-Book on Roofs and Bridges: Part I Stresses in Simple Trusses by Mansfield Merriman and Henry S. Jacoby
A Text-Book on Roofs and Bridges: Part II Graphic Statistics by Mansfield Merriman and Henry S. Jacoby
Logarithmic Tables of Numbers and Trigonometrical Functions by Baron Von Vega

separatedmaterial.p: Editions of the Bugle included in the donation were added to the collection of yearbooks kept in the University Archives.
